title: Recommended oil for my Audi
description: I used this and Liqui Moly Ceratec and Engine Flush on my Audi A3. Seemed to quiet the engine somewhat
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023

title: Engine runs so smooth
description: Put this in my 2016 Golf R. Runs so quiet, idles smooth. Very noticeable difference. Better gas mileage as well.  Runs cooler by a couple degrees as well. Always starts smooth in winter as well. Can’t recommend this enough.
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023

title: Work good for my audi
description: This brand of oil  works better for my Audi.

title: Helps my engine run smooth

title: Really nice oil. The best in my opinion
description: No dislikes really lubricates my engine and I do it every 8,000 miles since it’s that good. 5 star for sure
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023

title: Peace of mind
description: Strong engine protection when changed regularly. I use it for 6-8K miles on my tuned BMW 335i. Don’t know the difference versus the regular version though. I believe both are equally good.
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023

title: Excellent product
description: I’m a true convert to this oil. All the German car forums swear by this oil. I met one of the reps at SEMA and had good, informative conversations about the make up of this oil. All oil changes in my 2007 VW Rabbit will be done with this oil.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022

title: I've converted
description: First time ever using this green stuff. Flushed my engine with Ceratec and then filled it with this. Took like maybe a quarter tank or less before I noticed my engine working smoother than it had in a while. No more Castrol for me. I'm converted. \m/
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2022
